text:
@steve_hanke Its advisable for you to focus on your country of origin or residence. Our #IndianGovt is safe & capable under the Hon. PM @narendramodi ji. We will do our best to curtail the #COVID19 & don't give it to other nations. We shall all overcome this together 
#vasudevkutumbakkam
